item.description:
If you don't want to eat only popcorn during the movie, come join us at John Harvards for dinner. Have a beer and don't forget the kettle chip nachos...mmmm....kettle chip nachos.

I'll make a reservation in my name, Amy Hughes, and I'll be there about 15 minutes early. I'll get a table with enough seats for anyone who RSVPs "yes", so make sure to update your RSVP if you're coming to dinner.

I'll also be making a visit to my favorite cupcake haunt, Sweet, probably around 6:30. Stop by there if you want a mini cake of heaven.
item.name: Pre-Ghostbusters Dining
